biotools.summary: R package for CONdition-Dependent Operon Predictions. It is a tool in R to identify from RNA-seq transcriptome profiles operons expressed in a condition/transcriptome-specific manner, based on a Random Forest classifier.

bioschemas.name: CONDOP
bioschemas.summary: R package for CONdition-Dependent Operon Predictions. It is a tool in R to identify from RNA-seq transcriptome profiles operons expressed in a condition/transcriptome-specific manner, based on a Random Forest classifier.
